title: Bézier Watch Free Official
summary: The official Android Wear edition of Jack Frigaard's Bézier Clock - Free Version
description: This is the official Android Wear version of Jack Frigaard's Bézier Clock (http://jackf.net/bezier-clock/). With the same mesmerising animations, it'll look great on your wrist. If you like the watch, please buy the full version - you'll be helping a student pay for his university fees! Full version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.jackf.bezierwatchThis version allows customization of the following:    -  Foreground & background colours    -  4 different animation styles    -  12/24h time    -  6 different digit layouts    -  Digit stroke widthHowever in this free version these are reset to defaults every 3 minutes.All layouts are compatible with both round & square watches.
descriptionHTML:
This is the official Android Wear version of Jack Frigaard's Bézier Clock (http://jackf.net/bezier-clock/). With the same mesmerising animations, it'll look great on your wrist. If you like the watch, please buy the full version - you'll be helping a student pay for his university fees! Full version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.jackf.bezierwatch

This version allows customization of the following:

- Foreground & background colours
- 4 different animation styles
- 12/24h time
- 6 different digit layouts
- Digit stroke width

However in this free version these are reset to defaults every 3 minutes.

All layouts are compatible with both round & square watches.
comments: funky works as promised, no fuss no crap just plain awesome
recentChanges: Fixed problem where the watchface wasn't showing when cards were showing.
